name: W.R. Winslow Residuary Trust Scholarship
description: Awarded $51,250 per year for four years of medical education. Based on academic merit by Georgetown University School of Medicine.

name: Order of the Orange Stole
description: Graduate from undergraduate studies in three years

name: Member of Raven Society
description: Member of UVA's older and most prestigious honor society, named after Edgar Allen Poe's The Raven

name: Echols Scholar
description: Honors Program Awarded at Admission that waives general education requirements.

name: College Science Scholar
description: Attended scientific seminars given by esteemed UVA professors.
